title: Does ’13 Reasons’ Netflix series glorify teen suicide?
itunes:title: Does ’13 Reasons’ Netflix series glorify teen suicide?
description:
A Florida mom blames “13 Reasons” for contributing to suicidal thoughts in her teen son’s mind, leading to his need for psychiatric care. She criticizes a teacher for suggesting students watch the Netflix series without parents knowing. In this episode, Nancy Grace talks with psychologist Caryn Stark about what parents should know and do to prevent teen suicide.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
